data_utils module¶

class data_utils.AnnotationLabel(xray_name, side_name, organ_name, suborgan_name, label_type)[source]¶

Bases: object

Parameters

  • xray_name (string) -- name of the xray image on which the annotation is made

  • side_name (string) -- name of the side 'R' or 'L'

  • organ_name (string) -- name of the organ example feet or hands

  • suborgan_name (string) -- name of the area within the organ being measured

  • label_type (string) -- name of the type of label

data_utils.find_bone_annotations(target_folder, xray_id, date)[source]¶

Uses the aspax file structure to all bone annotations for xray with id xray_id taken on a certain date. Please see https://people.bath.ac.uk/amr62/Projects/malard/software/aspax.html for more details on aspax folder structure

Parameters

  • target_folder (str) -- folder containing a list of studies, need to follow aspax folder structure

  • xray_id (str) -- id of xray whose annotations need to be found, needs to correspond to a folder found in target_loc

  • date (str) -- date when xray was taken: needs to

Returns

target_loc,file_list, where target_loc is the location where the annotations were found and where file_list is a list of annotations found in target_loc

Return type

list

data_utils.find_joint_annotations(target_folder, xray_id, date)[source]¶

Uses the aspax file structure to all joint annotations for xray with id xray_id taken on a certain date. Please see https://people.bath.ac.uk/amr62/Projects/malard/software/aspax.html for more details on aspax folder structure

Parameters

  • target_folder (str) -- folder containing a list of studies, need to follow aspax folder structure

  • xray_id (str) -- id of xray whose annotations need to be found, needs to correspond to a folder found in target_loc

  • date (str) -- date when xray was taken: needs to

Returns

target_loc,file_list, where target_loc is the location where the annotations were found and where file_list is a list of annotations found in target_loc

Return type

list
